verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, we are here,
Jesus, we are here,
Jesus, we are here,
we are here for you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Saviour, we are here,
Saviour, we are here,
Saviour, we are here,
we are here for you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Master, we are here,
Master, we are here,
Master, we are here,
we are here for you.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Spirit, we are here,
Spirit, we are here,
Spirit, we are here,
we are here for you.
